Race.SpecificTitle: PW G.B. Cooley Hospital Service District -- 1.45 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide G. B. Cooley Hospital Service District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the G. B. Cooley Hospital Service District of Ouachita Parish, Louisiana, a Parishwide Hospital Service District (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax for one and forty-five hundredths (1.45) mills (the "Tax"), on all the property subject to taxation in said Hospital Service District (an estimated $1,647,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating hospital facilities for this District?
